    auditor - regression model verification, validation, and error analysis

    auditor’s pipeline: model %>% audit() %>% plot(type=…)

    Installation

    devtools::install_github("mi2-warsaw/auditor")

    Reference Manual

    News

    Quick preview of the assumptions and functions

    Attribute Verification Plot
    Residuals Residuals vs fitted values plotResiduals
    Homoscedasticity of the errors Goldfeld-Quandt score scoreGQ Variable vs square root of the absolute value of the residuals plotScaleLocation
    Uncorrelated errors Durbin-Watson score scoreDW Runs score scoreRuns i-th residual vs (i+1)-th residual plotAutocorrelation
    Uncorrelated errors AutoCorrelation Function plotACF
    Influential observations Cooks distance scoreCook plotCook
    error distribution Half-Normal score scoreHalfNormal Half-Normal plot plotHalfNormal

    This package is developed by the MI^2 group. MI^2 (pronounce: Am I square?) is a group of mathematicians and computer scientists that love to play with data. We create tools, do consulting and share our positive attitude.
